description:
The most adorable hero the world has ever known - Chopperman - must battle a hideously evil villain to regain control of his favorite television station!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chopperman entre en action ! Il faut protéger la chaîne de télévision en bord de plage
Go, Chopper Man! Protect the TV Station on the Beach
Shutsudou Chopperman! Mamore Nagisa no TV-kyoku
出動チョッパーマン! 守れ渚のTV局
